Name: Slip Past
Description: Deal 2 damage directly to the encounter deck as if there were no enemies on the field.

Name: Fur Frenzy
Description:
Remove 2 ⏳.
Deal 1 damage to up to two enemies.

Name: Nut Assault
Description:
Discard each card on your field.
Deal X damage divided as you choose among any number of enemies, where X is half the number of cards you discarded this way, rounded up.

Name: Fill Cheeks
Description:
Return up to five cards from your partner's field to your hand.
Until tommorow, if you would discard a card from anywhere, instead set it aside and draw it at the end of the night.
